=Example: Redirecting to Another Page=

* settings.py

{{{
SIMPLATE_DIRS = (
     '/path/to/simplates',
)
}}}
* urls.py

{{{

from django.conf.urls.defaults import *
from simplates.views import direct_to_simplate


urlpatterns = patterns('',
    (r'^$', direct_to_simplate),
)

}}}


* Simplate at /path/to/simplates/index.html:

{{{
"""First section: Python imports (exec'd at startup)
"""
from django.http import HttpResponseRedirect


#<!--===BREAK===-->
"""Second section: Python view code (exec'd on every request)
"""

if request.user.is_anonymous():
    raise SystemExit(HttpResponseRedirect('/login/'))


#<!--===BREAK===-->
{% comment %}
Third section: Django template (context is namespace from first two sections)
{% endcomment %}

<p>You must be authenticated to view this.</p>
}}}
